name.description: The name of the framework scheduler inside the base Marathon.

mesos-master.description: The address for the Mesos master.

tld.description: Top-level domain for creating marathon-lb virtual hosts for framework services.

vip.description: VIP to which gestalt-framework services are bound. Must not already be in use.

cpu-limit-framework.description: The CPU shares for the Gestalt framework.

mem-limit-framework.description: Memory limit (MB) for the Gestalt framework.

role.description: Deploy gestalt-framework-scheduler only on nodes with this role.

provision.description: Provision a database server for use by the framework services. Otherwise, requires a pre-existing database server.

provisioned-size.description: When provisioning the database, size for the persistent volume in MB.

hostname.description: The hostname for the database (only if pre-existing).

port.description: The port for the database (only if pre-existing).

username.description: The username for the database (provisioned or pre-existing)

password.description: The password for the database (provisioned or pre-existing)

prefix.description: A prefix for database names for the database (only if pre-existing)

admin-username.description: The username for the bootstrapped admin account.

admin-password.description: The password for the bootstrapped admin account (leave blank for none/no-login).

api-key.description: Admin API key, required if security is already initialized.

api-secret.description: Admin API secret, required if security is already initialized.

heap-min.description: Memory (MB) start size for the JVM heap. This number should be be less or equals than the heap-max.

heap-max.description: Memory (MB) max size for the JVM heap. This number should be less than the memory allocated to the gestalt-framework instance (General rule: 50%).
